title: Dua Lipa wears a navy suit as she serenades the crowd at the 20th New Yorker Festival
text:
She was spotted getting close with her model boyfriend Anwar Hadid earlier this month.

But Dua Lipa was on her own Friday as she performed a set at the 20th New Yorker Festival in Manhattan.

The 24–year–old musician and model showed off her fashion prowess with a striking suit-style dress.

Hitting the big time: Dua Lipa, 24, was the focus of the 20th New Yorker Festival on Friday as she gave a performance and sat down for an interview in Manhattan

Dua's outfit featured an oversize navy blue blazer that was cinched around her waist to showcase her hourglass figure.

The suit featured a matching pair of shorts, culminating in a knee-length pair of shiny black boots.

Dua had her raven tresses dyed blonde on top and resting delicately on her shoulders.

The two-time Grammy winner flaunted her neon yellow nails as she performed, which were decorated with curling black designs.

Dapper: Dua's outfit featured an oversize navy blue blazer that was cinched around her waist to showcase her hourglass figure

Singing up a storm: The singer performed new songs and tracks off her self-titled 2017 debut album

The evening's performance was split into two parts, with Dua performing new music and tracks from her self-titled 2017 debut album.

The album was a critical and commercial success and was reissued in 2018 with additional songs to capitalize on its success.

Dua walked home with the coveted Best New Artist award at the 2019 Grammy Awards, as well as the Grammy for Best Dance Recording for her song Electricity, a collaboration between her and the duo Silk City, comprised of producers Mark Ronson and Diplo.

Edgy style: Her suit featured a matching pair of shorts, culminating in a knee-length pair of shiny black boots

Meeting of the minds: In addition to her performance, the singer of Albanian descent sat down for a conversation with acclaimed New Yorker staff writer Amanda Petrusich, the recipient of a Guggenheim Fellowship for nonfiction and a Grammy nominee herself

New music: Dua is currently at work on her sophomore album, which she's said will arrive sometime later this year

In addition to her performance, the singer of Albanian descent sat down for a conversation with acclaimed New Yorker staff writer Amanda Petrusich, the recipient of a Guggenheim Fellowship for nonfiction and a Grammy nominee herself.

Dua is currently at work on her sophomore album, which she's said will arrive sometime later this year.

Recently, her relationship with model Anwar Hadid has been heating up.

The two struck up a relationship back in June, shortly after Anwar shared some of his musical side project with Dua, who's friends with his sister Gigi.

Love birds: Recently, her relationship with model Anwar Hadid has been heating up; pictured together October 9

Collaborators: The two struck up a relationship back in June, shortly after Anwar shared some of his musical side project with Dua, who's friends with his sister Gigi

Getting close: In September, The Sun reported that Dua and Anwar had moved in together to New York City apartment in order to be closer to each other when they weren't traveling

In September, The Sun reported that Dua and Anwar had moved in together to New York City apartment in order to be closer to each other when they weren't traveling.

'Dua and Anwar are spending all of their time together so it just made sense for them to rent this place,' said a source close to the couple.

'She’s always at his [apartment] when she’s in LA and he stays with her in London so this felt like the natural step.

'Once she comes back with new music she will spend more time in New York so it’s good for her to have a base there and it makes sense to him because a lot of his family live there,' they added.

Making it official: 'Dua and Anwar are spending all of their time together so it just made sense for them to rent this place,' said a source. 'She’s always at his [apartment] when she’s in LA and he stays with her in London so this felt like the natural step

Splitsville: Dua previously dated model and chef Isaac Carew on and off for five years, though the couple split in June, reportedly due to her hectic work schedule

Prior to her current relationship, Dua had been linked to the model and chef Isaac Carew.

The couple dated on and off for five years, though her increasingly hectic work scheduled reportedly soured their relationship.

The couple split a year after Isaac was seen grinding against a mystery woman in a nightclub while Dua's song One Kiss played in the background.

'I wouldn't want you to think that Dua is in a relationship with someone who doesn't love and respect her. She wouldn’t stand for it,' he said at the time.
description: Dua Lipa serenaded attendees of the New Yorker Festival on Friday while dressed in an oversize navy suit. The singer and model also sat down with writer Amanda Petrusich during the show.
